DOC.criteria: Histological cytological diagnosis advanced/metastatic solid tumor Adequate Bone Marrow Function Adequate Renal Function Adequate Liver Function Patients know symptomatic brain metastasis require steroid Current active treatment another clinical trial Major surgery radiation therapy within 4weeks start study treatment
